title: The Holiday Sale promotion comes to PlayStation Store
description: Undecided on your gaming plans for the holidays? Let PlayStation Store help with a sleigh-full of discounted delights!  We’re rounding off 2024 with one of the biggest promotions of the year, featuring numerous games and DLC, all reduced for a limited time*. That includes the likes of EA Sports FC 25, Call of Duty: Black […]
author: Zack Garvey
byline: Content Communication Specialist, Sony Interactive Entertainment
excerpt: Enjoy discounts across multiple games and DLC.
text: Skip to content Undecided on your gaming plans for the holidays? Let PlayStation Store help with a sleigh-full of discounted delights!  We’re rounding off 2024 with one of the biggest promotions of the year, featuring numerous games and DLC, all reduced for a limited time*. That includes the likes of EA Sports FC 25, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, NBA 2K25 and God of War Ragnarök.  And there are many more. So many, in fact, we can’t fit the entire list here. Preview a selection of the offers below, then, when the promotion starts on December 20, head to PlayStation Store to find out your regional discount.  A Plague Tale: Innocence A Plague Tale: Requiem html:
Skip to content

Undecided on your gaming plans for the holidays? Let PlayStation Store help with a sleigh-full of discounted delights! 

We’re rounding off 2024 with one of the biggest promotions of the year, featuring numerous games and DLC, all reduced for a limited time*. That includes the likes of EA Sports FC 25, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, NBA 2K25 and God of War Ragnarök. 

And there are many more. So many, in fact, we can’t fit the entire list here. Preview a selection of the offers below, then, when the promotion starts on December 20, head to PlayStation Store to find out your regional discount. 

  • A Plague Tale: Innocence
  • A Plague Tale: Requiem
